tool_description: RChilli Resume Templater converts any resume into a specified template format resume.
name: RChilli Resume Templater
title: RChilli Resume Templater

api_list.name: Resume Templater
api_list.description:
RChilli Resume Templater converts any resume into a specified template format resume.

The resume is first parsed using the Resume Parser API and then the parsed fields (JSON) are mapped with the fields in the selected template.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rchilli-resume-templater.p.rapidapi.com/resumeTemplate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rchilli-resume-templater.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rchilli-resume-templater.p.rapidapi.com/resumeTemplate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rchilli-resume-templater.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
